page.title: 12Changes, Wickhambreaux.
page.content: {****** Parishes ****** This year the Reverend Tyler is retiring from being Rector of Ickham, Wickhambreaux, and Stodmarsh. Sadly he is not going to be replaced. These three parishes are now joining Littlebourne. Stodmarsh joined Wickhambreaux in October 1930. Ickham joined Wickhambreaux and Stodmarsh in December 1965. Most of the area is in the civil parish of Wickhambreaux, which includes the ecclesiastical parishes of Stodmarsh and Wickhambreaux. { ****** Local Radio ****** During the 1980's a radio mast was erected at Swanton Farm. There was much discussion as to where it should go, some conservationists thinking it would spoil the beauty of the area.
